system.description:
Make an INT check to find an herb you choose. If you fail, you can't try to find that herb again until you successfully complete a rest. Unused herbs lose their effect in 3 rounds.

DC | Effect (Good for 1 Day)

11 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.m857P6MI00wAONTp]{Salve}. Heals 1 HP

12 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.dBQr9YPyhvwyPm0g]{Stimulant}. You can't be surprised for 10 rounds

13 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.FeoRamUTz5jakMJ8]{Foebane}. ADV on attacks and damage against one creature type you choose for [[/r 1d6]] rounds

14 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.QV93CYmgcgJ3UCPf]{Restorative}. Ends one poison or disease

15 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.talents.VjFsjhM6CZjZ04RT]{Curative}. Equivalent to a @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.magic-items.jucTGEjsqJ1znHdf]{Potion of Healing}
